1.content:
One Early Saturday morning Jason laid in his bed sleeping. He was Fast asleep without a single care in the world. Unfortunately Nothing could have possibly prepared Jason for what he would experience on this day. A loud noise woke him up almost giving him a heart attack. Jason jumped up looking around trying to find the source of the loud noise. He came face to face with his colossal alarm clock. "What in the world!" Jason ran climbing up his alarm clock and pulled the switch. "How did i get so small? This can't be happening." Jason refused to believe that he was really shrunk. "I mean come on this is literally impossible!". Jason couldn't believe he shrank over night. Jason began paced around his huge floor scratching his head trying to figure it all out.


Jason stopped remembering what today was. "today's the family cook out!" He was devistated "now the whole family will be here and i never get found!" Jason ran to his bedroom door, he ran as fast as he could. Jason crawled underneath the door peeking into The halls. There was not a single person around. Jason stood up standing close to his bedroom door. He had to think of who he could possibly go to for help. "Okay mom must be in her room, Amanda knowing her she must be sleeping in, and Abby is playing one of her strange games." He thought carefully about his opinions. He didn't want to trust just anyone at his current size.
